<!-- DO NOT EDIT | GENERATED CONTENT -->

# create

Create a token

## Usage

```console
create
```

## Options

### --lifetime

|             |                                    |
| ----------- | ---------------------------------- |
| Environment | <code>$CODER_TOKEN_LIFETIME</code> |

Specify a duration for the lifetime of the token.

### --name

|             |                                |
| ----------- | ------------------------------ |
| Environment | <code>$CODER_TOKEN_NAME</code> |

Specify a human-readable name.
